Text: Our bandwidth is limited and shared among 9-10 torrent seeds at all times + everything else we do with our bandwidth. For that reason, the basic foundation of torrents, SHARING what has been SHARED with you, is important for all our torrents. Please be unselfish and share these as much and as long as you can. We seed AND aim for a share ration of 40:1. Please do your part. Thanks.
Had some downtime due to our switch to OneSwarm 3.0.5.0 but seeding has resumed. Thanks to all those who continue to give what they got.
